member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.initialize(GAFInternal.Assets.GAFAnimationAssetInternal)
member.summary:
Initialize animation clip with it's root timeline. Crashes if root timeline is not present.
First operation that has to be performed to work with GAF playback.
Creating serializable data e.g. game objects of animation children.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.initialize(GAFInternal.Assets.GAFAnimationAssetInternal,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Initialize animation clip.
First operation that has to be performed to work with GAF playback.
Creating serializable data e.g. game objects of animation children.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.reload
member.summary:
Reload animation view.
Second operation that has to be performed to work with GAF playback.
Creating non-serializable data e.g. meshes, runtime materials.
Updating animation view to a currently selected frame.
Should be called every time when animation view has been changed e.g. setting animation color.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.getObject(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Getting reference to an object by ID
member.param: ID of animation suboject e.g "2_27" - "27" is object ID.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.getObject(System.String)
member.summary: Get object by name. If your object has custom name in inspector you can get it here.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.addTrigger(System.Action{GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip},System.UInt32)
member.summary:
Add event trigger on a desired frame.
Used for defining callbacks e.g. sounds, custom effects.
Returns ID of current event.
member.param: Event will been call on selected frame.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.removeTrigger(System.Action{GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip},System.UInt32)
member.summary: Remove callback from desired frame by frame ID.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.removeAllTriggers(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Remove all event triggers on selected frame.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.removeAllTriggers
member.summary: Remove all event triggers in current animation.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.removeTrigger(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove event trigger by its ID.

member.name: M:GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip.subscribeToDispatchEvent(System.Action{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},GAFInternal.Core.GAFBaseClip},System.UInt32)
member.summary:
Subscribe to dispatchEvent's callback on desired frame if it has dispatchEvent.
It is recommended to subscribe to dispatchEvent's callback in your Start() function.
If you have multiple dispatch events in one frame, you can override this method.
